modName: Forgotten Windmill - Purchase and clean up options - DELETED
summary: Replacement .esp for dj2005's Forgotten Windmill that will let you purchase the home and clean up oil spills, cobwebs etc.
descriptionHtml:
Exterior

Trees remove from in front of balcony.
Railing added to rear of balcony.
Boxes and barrrels removed.
Hay removed from under wood chopping block.

First / second floor

Cobwebs removed.
Dead insects removed.
Oil spill under shelf removed.
Fungus removed from stone table.

Top level

Boxes and barrels removed.
Paintings put back on wall.
Noble chair put back the right way up.

Basement

Blood stain, coal, hay and saw dust removed.
Broken barrel and oil spill removed.
Mushrooms removed from underneath workbench.
Wood pile next to mannequins removed.

Cave

Oil spill, two lanterns, knife and overturned chair removed from table.
Foliage and broken wood removed from underneath table.
author: Thicketford
